name: Maruti Brezza
description: The price of Maruti Brezza, a 5 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 8.34  - 14.14 Lakh. It is available in 15 variants, with an engine of 1462 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Brezza comes with 6 airbags. Maruti Brezza is available in 10 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 19.05 to 25.51 kmpl for Brezza.
